name: distributed-tracing
title: Distributed Tracing with Jaeger and OpenTelemetry
description: Learn distributed tracing by instrumenting microservices with OpenTelemetry and visualizing traces in Jaeger.
prerequisites: Understanding of HTTP and REST APIs
learning_objectives: Understand distributed tracing concepts (traces, spans, context)
Set up Jaeger for trace collection and visualization
Use Jaeger UI to analyze and debug traces
Add custom spans and attributes for better observability

tasks.description: Add OpenTelemetry tracing to the database service

tasks.description: Run docker-compose and verify all services are healthy
